thm-ueph.title: k-Uniform Ellipticity of the Regularized Metric
thm-ueph.statement: c_min(ρ) I ⪯ G_reg ⪯ c_max(ρ) I for all N, all ρ > 0
thm-ueph.role: Establishes well-posedness and non-degeneracy of adaptive diffusion

thm-foster-lyapunov.title: Foster-Lyapunov Drift for ρ-Localized Geometric Viscous Fluid
thm-foster-lyapunov.statement: For ε_F < ε_F*(ρ), drift ≤ -(1-κ_total(ρ)) V_total + C_total(ρ)
thm-foster-lyapunov.role: Main drift condition enabling geometric ergodicity

thm-geometric-ergodicity.title: Geometric Ergodicity of the Geometric Viscous Fluid Model
thm-geometric-ergodicity.statement: Exponential convergence to unique QSD with rate λ = 1 - κ_total(ρ)
thm-geometric-ergodicity.role: Final convergence guarantee for adaptive algorithm

thm-lsi-adaptive-gas.title: N-Uniform Log-Sobolev Inequality
thm-lsi-adaptive-gas.role: Entropy decay and concentration of measure

thm-keystone-adaptive.title: Keystone Lemma for ρ-Localized Adaptive Model
thm-keystone-adaptive.statement: Cloning operator contracts ρ-localized variance with ρ-dependent constants
thm-keystone-adaptive.role: Extends backbone Keystone Principle to adaptive setting

outputs: Drift ≤ -(1 - κ_total(ρ)) V_total + C_total(ρ) for ε_F < ε_F*(ρ)

inputs: Irreducibility and aperiodicity (from positive diffusion + cloning)

outputs: Exponential convergence ||μ_t - π_∞|| ≤ C e^{-λt} with λ = 1 - κ_total(ρ)
